name: Getty Images (UK) Limited
goal: Our vision is to move the world with images. We invest in the production, marketing and licensing of new creative, inspiring and otherwise unseen content. Images are the language of the Internet, we help to stimulate and shape the conversation.
interests: Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Single market, Sport
euInitiatives: Copyright aspects of the Digital Single Market Strategy as well as the proposed regulation of digital platforms.
